MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY6 postcode area of Glenrothes, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:56pm. Our engineers have onsite at the Cullen Drive substation . And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:52 PM on Monday, 15 February 2021.
